text: Grandval railway station () is a railway station in the municipality of Grandval, in the Swiss canton of Bern. It is an intermediate stop on the standard gauge Solothurn–Moutier line of BLS AG and is served by local trains only. == Services == The following services stop at Grandval: * Regio: hourly service between and . == References == == External links == * * Category:Railway stations in the canton of Bern Category:BLS railway stations
title: Grandval railway station
